00020 #ifndef OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_H
00021 #define OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_H
00022 
00023 #include <openrave/openrave.h>
00024 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00025 
00026 // export symbol prefix for plugin functions
00027 #define OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API extern "C" OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_EXPORT
00028 
00030 #define RAVE_PLUGIN_API OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API
00031 
00043 OpenRAVE::InterfaceBasePtr CreateInterfaceValidated(OpenRAVE::InterfaceType type, const std::string& name, std::istream& sinput, OpenRAVE::EnvironmentBasePtr penv);
00044 
00053 void GetPluginAttributesValidated(OpenRAVE::PLUGININFO& info);
00054 
00057 OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API OpenRAVE::InterfaceBasePtr OpenRAVECreateInterface(OpenRAVE::InterfaceType type, const std::string& name, const char* interfacehash, const char* envhash, OpenRAVE::EnvironmentBasePtr penv)
00058 {
00059     if( strcmp(interfacehash,OpenRAVE::RaveGetInterfaceHash(type)) ) {
00060     throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("bad interface %s hash: %s!=%s",RaveGetInterfaceName(type)%interfacehash%OpenRAVE::RaveGetInterfaceHash(type),OpenRAVE::ORE_InvalidInterfaceHash);
00061     }
00062     if( !penv ) {
00063         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("need to set environment",OpenRAVE::ORE_InvalidArguments);
00064     }
00065     if( strcmp(envhash,OPENRAVE_ENVIRONMENT_HASH) ) {
00066         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("bad environment hash: %s!=%s",envhash%OPENRAVE_ENVIRONMENT_HASH,OpenRAVE::ORE_InvalidPlugin);
00067     }
00068     OpenRAVE::RaveInitializeFromState(penv->GlobalState()); // make sure global state is set
00069     std::stringstream sinput(name);
00070     std::string interfacename;
00071     sinput >> interfacename;
00072     std::transform(interfacename.begin(), interfacename.end(), interfacename.begin(), ::tolower);
00073     return CreateInterfaceValidated(type,interfacename,sinput,penv);
00074 }
00075 
00078 OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API void OpenRAVEGetPluginAttributes(OpenRAVE::PLUGININFO* pinfo, int size, const char* infohash)
00079 {
00080     if( pinfo == NULL ) {
00081         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("bad data",OpenRAVE::ORE_InvalidArguments);
00082     }
00083     if( size != sizeof(OpenRAVE::PLUGININFO) ) {
00084         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT("bad plugin info sizes %d != %d", size%sizeof(OpenRAVE::PLUGININFO),OpenRAVE::ORE_InvalidPlugin);
00085     }
00086     if( strcmp(infohash,OPENRAVE_PLUGININFO_HASH) ) {
00087         throw OPENRAVE_EXCEPTION_FORMAT0("bad plugin info hash",OpenRAVE::ORE_InvalidPlugin);
00088     }
00089     GetPluginAttributesValidated(*pinfo);
00090     pinfo->version = OPENRAVE_VERSION;
00091 }
00092 
00095 OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API void DestroyPlugin();

00098 
00099 #endif
